casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

September 7, 2006

[Cite as 09/07/2006 Case Announcements, 2006-Ohio-4578.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2006-0295. State v. White.

Summit App. No. 22591, 2005-Ohio-6990. This cause is pending before the court as a death penalty post conviction appeal. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion to extend time for oral argument,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted, and the parties shall each be allotted thirty minutes of argument time.
